name: return_info
description: Return the info on the person

name.description: The name of the person. This CANNOT have the word 'Person' in it.

age.description: The estimated age of the person.

interests.description: Interests that the person has. Each of these should be a few words long max.

dislikes.description: Things the person dislikes. Each of these should be a few words long max.

personality.description: A short description of the person's personality.
